name: El Reloj - El Ocho
additionalNotes:
El Reloj Cigars are value-priced handmades from the famous J.C Newman Cigar Co. An Ecuadorian Sun-Grown wrapper surrounds a tasty blend of Nicaraguan, Honduran, and Dominican filler tobaccos for a smooth smoke with interesting full flavor. Made in the last operating cigar factory in cigar city (Tampa, 
Featuring a blend of quality aged tobaccos from the Dominican Republic and Nicaragua, each cigar is carefully rolled with a rich Ecuadorian Havana Seed Sungrown wrapper the way Julius Caeser Newman made them back in 1954 when he moved his operation from Cleveland, Ohio to the “El Reloj” cigar factory Tampa, FL.
